creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
description: fragment of wall shelf (Eagle wall bracket), wood, should be one piece; carved and gilded; eagle's head turned to left, one red glass eye; flat, molded shelf supported on head and spread wings; feet rest on rococo motif, on which is superimposed naturalistic rose carved in the round; Chippendale style
title: Wall Shelf (fragment)
